text: I had a great experience with Dr. Johnson and his wonderful clinic staff when I did LASIK in Dec last year. Dr. Johnson was professional and took the time to explain everything, which made me feel at ease. The staff were kind and caring, ensuring I was comfortable throughout the entire process. Thanks to their excellent care, my LASIK procedure was smooth and successful. Highly recommend Dr. Johnson for anyone considering LASIK!
did my PRK with dr johnson here and everything from start to end was excellent. results were flawless. also well done to the whole team (PSAs, nurses, optometrists) for the wonderful service!

Came here for my TRANS PRK surgery and my experience was superb. Dr Johnson is such a capable and patient doctor! I whole heartedly trust him with my eyes. The staff were excellent in all aspects too, thanks!

Edit: post surgery service was impeccable too. Nothing to complain about
Got my PRK done here. Perfect vision. Staffs are super friendly and Dr Johnson is professional, knowledgeable and went extra mile. Highly recommended.

Doctor Johnson Tan was extremely patient and guided me through the entire Lasik process. Even though I was nervous, his encouragement and reassurance helped me overcome these obstacles and I am happy to say that I am very satisfied with the final results after 3 months. Highly recommend getting Lasik done here because personally I had a 10/10 experience.
